mapper.select: select * from BP_ELEMENT where 1=1 and MODU_CODE=#{moduCode}
SELECT MODU_CODE, MODU_CNAME, MODU_TC, REL_TABLE, b.PACK_NAME, b.VUE_PATH, b.JAVA_PATH FROM BP_MODULE a LEFT JOIN bp_systems b ON a.modu_code = b.mod_code WHERE 1 = 1 AND MODU_CODE = #{moduCode}
SELECT B.COL_CODE FROM BP_MODULE A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM BP_FIELD WHERE PK_GEN IS NOT NULL ) B ON A.REL_TABLE = B.TAB_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MODU_CODE = #{moduCode}
